sentences.en: Already the hospitals were worrying about the scarcity of quinine, calomel, opium, chloroform and iodine.
sentences.cn: 各个医院已经在为缺乏奎宁 、 甘汞 、 鸦片 、 哥罗仿、碘酒等等而发愁.

sentences.en: But there are risks to using false scarcity as a strategy.
sentences.cn: 但是,使用短缺错觉这种营销策略是有风险的.

sentences.en: Costs, not physical scarcity, are the only economic test of a shortage of natural resources.
sentences.cn: 自然资源匮乏的唯一经济判断是成本, 而不是实物的稀缺.

sentences.en: Economics must still contend with scarcity as a basic fact of life.
sentences.cn: 经济学仍然必须和稀缺相周旋,把稀缺当作生活中一种基本的事实.

sentences.en: If there was a scarcity of anything, prices of that thing went up.
sentences.cn: 如果什么物品短缺, 那种物品的价格就上涨.

sentences.en: More recently, economists have also been obliged to deal with the concept of absolute scarcity.
sentences.cn: 最近以来, 经济学家们又不得不去研究绝对稀缺这一概念.

sentences.en: That would only betoken for us seven years of plenty and seven years of scarcity.
sentences.cn: 那只是预示我们将有七年丰收和七年饥荒.

sentences.en: The central concern of economics is expressed in the concept of scarcity.
sentences.cn: 经济学关心的中心问题是以稀缺的概念表示出来的.

sentences.en: The contrary of this happens in a year of sudden and extraordinary scarcity.
sentences.cn: 在突然发生的非常大荒年,情形正相反.

sentences.en: The scarcity of fruit was caused by the drought.
sentences.cn: 水果供不应求是由于干旱造成的.

sentences.en: The scarcity of internally - generated pollen may be overlooked.
sentences.cn: 这样国内花粉不足的情况便会被忽视.

sentences.en: Their price depended almost entirely on their scarcity.
sentences.cn: 它们的价格几乎完全取决于它们的稀有程度。

sentences.en: This is the insane doctrine of wealth through scarcity.
sentences.cn: 这种通过制造短缺来创造财富的信条,实在是疯狂透顶.

sentences.en: Water scarcity is reaching crisis proportions now because of skewed supply and demand.
sentences.cn: 由于水的供求关系的扭曲,水资源紧缺现已达到危机程度.

trans.tran_en: a situation in which there is not enough of something
